snippet.title: Squeaky Clean Teaser
snippet.description:
OUT NOW : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1606950/Squeaky_Clean/

Squeaky Clean is a psychological horror game set entirely in the shower. Manage your cleanliness while strange ghost-like beings haunt you. Simple controls and quick but challenging levels ensure that Squeaky Clean can be played and feared by everyone

Experience the horror of your average shower!
Absorb hot shower tunes by Hoovobot
Watch the fate of five very clean shower-folk
Endure the challenge of survival!

Squeaky Clean is best enjoyed in a dark room with headphones and includes many jump scares, flashing lights, adult language, and occasional intense scenes.
